title: Conduct a Project Lessons Learned Meeting
description: After a project is complete, the PM holds a 'lessons learned' meeting with the team to identify successes and failures to improve future projects.

tasks.description: Schedule a lessons learned meeting with the key project team members.
During the meeting, document what went well and what could be improved.
tasks.expected_outcome: A list of successes and areas for improvement is documented.

tasks.description: Archive the lessons learned document in the company's knowledge base for future reference.
tasks.expected_outcome: The document is successfully archived and tagged for future projects.
